pages.text: Created with all the knowledge you have gathered, you have created the Spirit Instiller. It serves to be able to connect the energies of two items, with the help of a third object to bind them.\\An almost spiritual process.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Spirit Instiller needs a focus structure to work. To rotate the structure hologram in the direction you want it to, click on the placed Spirit Instiller itself.

pages.name: Instiller Structure
pages.text: Dimensions: 8x9x5 blocks\It can be enhanced using [Upgrades](book://magical_blocks/upgrades) by placing them on the two [#](bb00bb)Onyx Chiseled Blocks[#]().

pages.title: Block Checklist
pages.text: - 1 Spirit Instiller\- 2 Item Bowls\- 2 Notched Polished Blocks\- 2 Chiseled Polished Blocks\- 2 Onyx Chiseled Blocks\- 6 Polished Pillars\- 17 Polished Slabs\- 41 Polished Blocks\- 2 Gemstone Chimes
